title: WANDAVISION EPISODE 6 BREAKDOWN! Easter Eggs & Details You Missed! (1x06 Halloween Episode)
author: New Rockstars
description:
WandaVision 1x06 full episode shot-by-shot analysis! Who is â€œPietro,â€ actually? Head to http://upstart.com/newrockstars to find out how you can lower your monthly payments today.

SPOILERS ahead!

If you're interested in being Social Bluebook and New Rockstars' new bad-ass social media manager, check out the job description below.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-w34VcOueRNcdUw-9nl_zPXuRNOa-1v9uqnknGKjUXQ/edit?usp=sharing

Check out our sweet, sweet merch! http://www.newrockstarsmerch.com
Subscribe:â€‹ â€‹http://bit.ly/SubNewRockstarsâ€‹ | Enable ALL push notifications â€‹ ğŸ””
Watch the NEWEST videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4xEo4XxrSJbbjsGMSWDN62z8XB6QzHFy

WandaVisionâ€™s sixth episode, â€œAll-New Halloween Spooktacularâ€ set in the 2000s â€œMalcolm in the Middleâ€ era, shows the Maximoff family on Halloween night as Wandaâ€™s Westview hex expands, Pietroâ€™s dark nature comes out, Agnes brings up more questions, and the darkest commercial yet has everyone wondering how these correspond to Wandaâ€™s secret past. Erik Voss breaks down all the Easter Eggs you missed, including the creepy Halloween stalkers in the background behind Wanda, Pietroâ€™s subtle gestures hinting at his dark agenda, and the deeper meaning of the Yo-Magic commercial. Does Wandaâ€™s hex create mutants? How does the Marvel Multiverse work? Is Pietro actually Mephisto?

New Rockstars supports efforts to end racial violence. Please help those struggling, however you can: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ms_blm_homepage_2019

About New Rockstars:
Hey everyone, welcome to the official New Rockstars YouTube channel! We cover what the internet cares about. From Marvel to the Walking Dead, Rick and Morty to Stranger Things, James Bond to Star Wars, and more. We got you covered in every movie and television show you might love! Donâ€™t forget to subscribe and enable all push notifications so you never miss a review, breakdown, or theory.
